# Visit the Mansion House

##### ​

## Tours and Experiences

There are many ways to experience the Oneida Community Mansion House!

The Mansion House is open year-round for guided and self-guided tours with the exception of major holidays*.

Hours

The Museum is open Wednesday through Sunday, 10 am to 4 pm for Self-Guided Tours.

In-Depth Guided Tours, Wed. 10 am, Sat. 10 am & 2 pm, or by appointment.

​Hours subject to change during special events. Call to confirm availability for self-guided tours.

If your group—whether a club, school, or friends—can only visit on a Monday or Tuesday, please reach out and we’ll do our best to accommodate you. Email [tours@oneidacommunity.org ](mailto:tours@oneidacommunity.org?subject=Monday%20%26%20Tuesday%20Tour%20Info)or call at 315-363-0745. 

​

In-Depth Guided Tours

The best way to learn about the Oneida Community and its Legacy is through a guided tour with our talented and knowledgeable guides. Guides will share the story of the most radical American utopian community and its legacy as a major silverware company. Guests will walk through both historic rooms and museum displays.

Tours typically last 90 minutes.

Guided tours: Wed. 10 am, Sat. 10 am & 2 pm, or by appointment. 

Please email [tours@oneidacommunity.org](mailto:tours@oneidacommunity.org?subject=Schedule%20a%20Guided%20Tour) at least 48 hours in advance to schedule.

## Step into History. Stay for the Experience.

Welcome to the 93,000-square-foot former home of the utopian Oneida Community (1848-1880)—a place where bold ideas and progressive values shaped both architecture and society.

A National Historic Landmark, the Mansion House invites you to explore, relax, and experience history firsthand. Wander through beautifully preserved historic rooms, engaging museum exhibits, and immersive programs that bring the past to life.

##### Visit Us!

Uncover the remarkable story of the Oneida Community. Immerse yourself in our museum's captivating exhibits, wander through our breathtaking grounds, and connect with our passionate team who are eager to share the extraordinary story of the Oneida Community.
